unit_safety_officer.label: Unit Safety Officer/NCO
unit_safety_officer.bullet: Administered workplace safety program ensuring OSHA compliance, conducting regular inspections and maintaining zero incident rate

equal_opportunity_rep.label: Equal Opportunity Representative
equal_opportunity_rep.bullet: Managed diversity, equity, and inclusion program for organization, conducting training sessions and mediating workplace concerns

training_nco_officer.label: Training NCO/Officer
training_nco_officer.bullet: Designed and executed comprehensive training programs for 50+ personnel, tracking completion metrics and ensuring regulatory compliance

key_control_custodian.label: Key Control Custodian
key_control_custodian.bullet: Managed physical security access control program, maintaining 100% accountability of sensitive assets through rigorous inventory and audit procedures

arms_room_officer.label: Arms Room Officer/NCO
arms_room_officer.bullet: Oversaw inventory management and accountability of high-value equipment valued at $2M+, maintaining zero loss rate through systematic tracking and auditing

hazmat_nco.label: HAZMAT NCO
hazmat_nco.bullet: Administered hazardous materials handling and disposal program in compliance with EPA and OSHA regulations, training personnel on proper storage and emergency response procedures

physical_fitness_leader.label: Physical Fitness Leader
physical_fitness_leader.bullet: Developed and led structured wellness and fitness programs for 30+ personnel, tracking individual progress metrics and improving overall team performance by 20%

records_management_officer.label: Records Management Officer
records_management_officer.bullet: Administered organizational records management program ensuring compliance with federal retention schedules, overseeing digitization and secure archival of sensitive documents

sharp_representative.label: SHARP Representative (Sexual Harassment/Assault Response)
sharp_representative.bullet: Served as certified victim advocate and prevention coordinator, conducting climate assessments, facilitating mandatory training, and providing confidential crisis support

supply_accountability_nco.label: Supply Accountability NCO
supply_accountability_nco.bullet: Managed supply chain operations and property accountability for equipment valued at $5M+, conducting cyclic inventories and reconciling discrepancies to maintain 100% accountability

unit_prevention_leader.label: Unit Prevention Leader
unit_prevention_leader.bullet: Coordinated substance abuse prevention and education program, conducting risk assessments, facilitating intervention referrals, and maintaining confidential case management records

voting_assistance_officer.label: Voting Assistance Officer
voting_assistance_officer.bullet: Administered federal voting assistance program for 200+ personnel, ensuring compliance with UOCAVA regulations and facilitating civic engagement through education campaigns

resilience_master_fitness_trainer.label: Resilience/Master Fitness Trainer
resilience_master_fitness_trainer.bullet: Designed and implemented holistic performance optimization programs integrating physical fitness, mental resilience, and nutrition education for organizational readiness

comsec_custodian.label: Communications Security (COMSEC) Custodian
comsec_custodian.bullet: Managed classified communications security material and cryptographic equipment, enforcing strict access controls, conducting audits, and maintaining zero security incidents

unit_public_affairs_rep.label: Unit Public Affairs Representative
unit_public_affairs_rep.bullet: Served as organizational communications liaison, drafting press releases, coordinating media engagements, and managing internal communications to stakeholders
